game.name: Forest Home
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Something's gone wrong in the forest! All the animals are lost, and only you can guide them home. Draw colorful paths that grow right beneath your finger, mouse or gamepad to lead the forest critters to safety. Avoid obstacles, navigate bridges, and collect food in this cute & challenging puzzler.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Something's gone wrong in the forest! All the animals are lost, and only you can guide them home. Draw colorful paths that grow right beneath your finger, mouse or gamepad to lead the forest critters to safety. Avoid obstacles, navigate bridges, and collect food in this cute & challenging puzzler.

reviewHighlights.text: A great puzzle game with a really well-made port from mobile. No microtransactions or stressful timers, and puzzles get increasingly difficult as you...
